title: Textile, "Pearlised Stripe", 1984
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Along each side, "PEARLISED STRIPE By EDDIE SQUIRES AN EXCLUSIVE WARNER DESIGN Copyright (Symbol) MCMLXXXIV By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top".
description: Vertical stripes of varying width in two shades of blue and gold on white. Pattern takes up 128cm (50 1/4in.) leaving a margin at both sides. Printing medium creates a puckered surface on the fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Pearlised Stripe", 1984.
1984. Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-27.
